mapper.select:
select * from msa_base_acct_info
true and entity_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{entity_name}),'%') and csp_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{csp_name}),'%') and account_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{account_name}),'%') and account_no LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{account_no}),'%') AND status = #{status} AND data_source = #{data_source}
